The property itself offers a functional floor plan consisting of 4 bedrooms plus study which can be used as a 5th bedroom. All guest bedrooms complete with built in robes not to mention the generously sized master providing a full en-suite with an oversized shower space.

Surrounded by top end properties and is within walking distance to picturesque wetlands, this home boasts convenience.
